Classes in com.revolsys.io.xml used by com.revolsys.io.esri.gdb.xml.model
XmlProcessor
           The XmlProcessor class provides a framework for processing an XML Document to create a Java Object representation of the document or to perform other actions on the contents of the document.
 

Classes in com.revolsys.io.xml used by com.revolsys.io.esri.gdb.xml.type
XmlWriter
           The XmlWriter class is a subclass of Writer that provides additional methods to write XML documents.

Classes in com.revolsys.io.xml used by com.revolsys.io.xml
XmlDataObjectIoFactory
           
XmlProcessorContext
           The XmlProcessorContext interface is used by XmlProcessor implementations to record errors in processing an XML document and to share attributes (objects) between the process methods.
XmlProcessorError
          The XmlProcessorError class is used to record the information about an error in processing an XML document by the XmlProcessor class.
XmlWriter
           The XmlWriter class is a subclass of Writer that provides additional methods to write XML documents.
